name: MongoDb to BigQuery
description: Reads records from MongoDb Collection and writes them to a BigQuery table

parameters.name: mongoDBUri
parameters.label: MongoDB Connection URI
parameters.helpText: List of Mongo DB nodes separated by comma. ex: 192.285.234.12:27017,192.287.123.11:27017

parameters.name: database
parameters.label: mongo database
parameters.helpText: Database in MongoDB to store the collection. ex: my-db.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.label: mongo collection
parameters.helpText: Name of the collection inside MongoDB database. ex: my-collection.

parameters.name: outputTableSpec
parameters.label: BigQuery table spec to write the data
parameters.helpText: BigQuery destination table spec. e.g bigquery-project:dataset.output_table

parameters.name: userOption
parameters.label: user option
parameters.helpText: Could be one of FLATTEN or NONE. FLATTEN will flatten the documents for 1 level. NONE will store the whole document as json string.
